package

FINDCov19Tracker-package

FINDCov19Tracker: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

Test data

fetch_test_data()

Scrape test data from countries via R

get_test_data()

Get tests from different sources (Selenium, fetch, and manual) and combine them. Using the parameter days, all files in automated/merged/ are updated for the last dates given the input number.

combine_all_tests()

Combine test daily data from all countries across all dates

calc_manual_countries()

Find and write countries which need manual processing

process_test_data()

Postprocess tests data for input into Shiny App

segregated_test_data()

Get segregated tests from Selenium and combine them. Using the parameter days, all files in automated/merged/ are updated for the last dates given the input number.

updates_dates_countries()

last_update

Cases data

download_jhu_data()

Download JHU data

check_jhu_data()

Perform Consistency Checks

preprocess_jhu_data()

Preprocess JHU data Processes JHU input data

process_jhu_data()

Update John Hopkins University data

Prepare Shiny App Input

create_shiny_data()

Create Input Data for Shiny Application
